articles.title: SA stars Kapp, Ismail score big at Women's Premier League auction, Van Niekerk to RCB, Tryon to MI - News24
articles.description: South African national women's cricketers Shabnim Ismail and Marizanne Kapp landed themselves cool amounts at the Women's Premier League auction where they were snapped up by the UP Warriorz and the Delhi Capitals.
articles.content:
• South Africa's representation at the upcoming Women's Premier League in India is under way.
  • Marizanne Kapp was picked up by the Delhi Capitals and Shabnim Ismail by the UP Warriorz.
